summary: This Player home is a tower built into the side of a mountain with a small story. The tower has many hidden rooms and objects to seek out and find. There are no pics of the hidden rooms on Nexus.
descriptionHtml:
This Player home is a tower built into the side of a mountain with a small story. The tower has many hidden rooms and objects to seek out and find. There are no pics of the hidden rooms on Nexus. 

Here is a list of some of the things you can find within:
Alchemy lab on the balconey.
Experiment room with Staff Making fasilities.
Central tower with Enchanting altar, storage, and Library.
Kitchen with lots of storage. 
Fully equiped Blacksmith room, able to make skyforge equiptment.
Church of the gods room.
Bed Room with many many mannequins and storage.
Basement with even more storage and a wine cellar!
Several special hidden rooms.
Map marker on the balcony for easy access (you have to activate it ingame).
And more.

YOU NEED:All DLC.

[b]You must download http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11682/?[/b]

Installation: 
Extract to a safe place like desktop and open the folders till you get to the Data folder, put all the files in the Data folder into your games Data folder.


Bugs:It's only happened once but the soul gem container lost gravity and began to float around (Don't hold the use button too long).
The other bug I can't fix so you might be able to help me. The mannequins have both a talk and use function. TALK is in their centre and USE is a bit to the right.
And oddly everytime I try to load this in the Creation Kit it crashes. Need help on this one too. (UPDATE: CRASH PROBLEM SOLVED!)

Credit to:
Able One aka Falconer084/BFB/Ben F Bridges.
Sorti for Strotis Ovens Resource, Stroti Resource Pack, and Strotis Spinnig Wheel.
Blary for Alchemy Clutter Resource, Open Books Resource, and Moth in Cage Resource.
Tamira for the Antique Statue
Urwy for the Control Rod
BrettM for the FPI Experiment Pack 
mcmanus82 for the Mirrored Statues
Oaristys & Tony67 for the MODDER'S RESOURCE PACK 2.0
Artisanix for the Paintings and FramesThe_Funktasm for the TF MWClutter
Thanks to all the great resource makers! If I've forgotten someone please let me know.
author: AbleOne or Ben F Bridges
